Title: Data Use Agreement
Description: A TRE that wants to cover datasets from a specific data type needs to provide a model Data Use Agreement (DUA) that covers necessary requirements specific to the data type. DUAs should include access prerequisites, requirements and obligations.
Related URL: Example from existing TREs on clinical trials: https://accessclinicaldata.niaid.nih.gov/dashboard/Public/files/NIAIDDUA2023Accessclinicaldata@NIAID.pdf

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Model Data Use Agreement Templates per Data Type
